channel.title: CVE Feed for Centros Digitales -- Gescen
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Centros Digitales -- Gescen

item.title: CVE-2024-4466|2024-05-03T11:44:41.270Z -- Centros Digitales -- Gescen
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Gescen on the centrosdigitales.net platform. This vulnerability allows an attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the pass parameter and retrieve all the data stored in the database.
